Package io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.entities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This class represents a chess board.
    Continuation
    A continuation associates some statistics to a given move.
    Game
    A game object.
    Move
    Represents a move by a player, such as 'e4'.
    MoveText
    This class acts as an accumulator for text moves.
    Piece
    A piece is a combination of a figurine and a color, such as a White Pawn ("WP"), or a Black Queen ("BQ").
    Position
    The position keeps state of all Pieces on board.
    Vertex
    A Vertex represents a square of the board, and is referenced by a set of two coordinates (row and column indices).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color
    Color played by a player, i.e. one of WHITE or BLACK.
    Direction
    This reflects directions on a board, with the White player being South, and the Black player being North.
    Figurine
    Enumeration of all figurine pieces, including pawns.
    Result
    Represents the end result of a game: one of the player wins, the game ends into a draw, or is unfinished.
